Spells:
Align Weapon (Devil Evil2 Tran): Touched weapon gains alignment for 20 min (DC 14 Will neg)
Blasphemy (Devil Evil7 Evoc): Nonevil creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD dazed for 1 rd (DC 19 Will neg)/suffer -2d6 Strength for 2d4 rd (DC 19 Will half)/paralyzed for 1d10 min (DC 19 Will for 1 rd)/killed (DC 19 Will suffer 3d6+20 HP) and banished (DC 19 Will -4 neg)
Command (Devil Evil1 Ench): R75' Target obeys self commands to approach, drop, fall, flee, or halt for 1 rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Dispel Good (Devil Evil5 Abju): Self gains +4 AC vs. good and dismisses good creature via touch (DC 17 Will neg) or spell
Expeditious Retreat (Exploration1 Tran): Self gains +30' Speed for 20 min
Find The Path (Exploration6 Divi): Touched knows most direct route to location for 200 min
Fly (Exploration3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 min
Greater Teleport (Exploration7 Conj): Transports self and 6 others anywhere w/no error chance
Locate Creature (Exploration4 Divi): Self senses direction of creature or kind in 1200' radius for 200 min
Locate Object (Exploration2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 1200' radius for 20 min
Phase Door (Exploration8 Conj): Allows 10 passes through 8'x5'x25' wood, stone, or plaster; adding another creature uses a pass
Planar Binding (Devil Evil6 Conj): Traps extraplanar creature(s) w/up to 12 HD (DC 18 Will neg) until they escape (SR, dimensional travel, or 27 Cha) or perform a task (Opposed Cha neg)
Suggestion (Devil Evil3 Ench): R75' Target follows reasonable suggestion for 20 hr (DC 15 Will neg)
Summon Monster IX (Devil Evil9 Conj): R75' 1 9th-, 1d3 8th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Teleport (Exploration5 Conj): Transports self and 6 others 2000 miles w/some error chance
Unholy Aura (Devil Evil8 Abju): 20 creatures in 20' radius gain +4 AC and saves and SR 25 (good), suppress mental control, and inflict -1d6 Strength on successful good attacker (DC 20 Fort neg) for 20 rd
Unholy Blight (Devil Evil4 Evoc): R300' Good in 20' radius suffer 5d8 HP and sicken for 1 rd, neutral half (DC 16 Will half)
World Wave (Exploration9 Tran): Self rides 20'x10' natural terrain oval that forms 30' wave for 20 rd or 5' swell for 20 hr, moves 240'/rd, and inflicts 6d6 (wave) or 1d6 (swell) HP bludgeoning to non-natural objects (constructs and undead suffer dbl HP)
